Headline: UPDATE: Trains bypassing Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations
ShortDescription: UPDATE: Brown, Green, Pink, and Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
UPDATE: Brown, Green, Pink, and Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Trains bypassing Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: No trains between Halsted and the Loop
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Halsted and the Loop due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Halsted and the Loop due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Midway and Halsted at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Halsted and Ashland/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
